phrases: Are you really okay with making such a discussion just like that?

There is not.

the seal on the shine will be unleashed, allowing she who swears upon the ancestors' souls to become the family head.

It is when the orbit of Venus aligns with the Moon, hiding it for a short time.

Aunt's snakes!
What a piddling effort.
You are no more than a child without your magic.

Diana is not the type of person to act randomly or without reason.

Plus, her stubbornness will not let her go back on her word anyway.
Plus, she is stubborn enough not to go back on her word.

But I still cannot accept it.

Is this okay?
Mama told us to wait in our room.

I am worried about her going alone.
So how did it go?
It took no more than a piddling effort.
Yeah, she might be able to break through any light magic.

I am already anxious to see the look on her arrogant little face come tomorrow morning.
I can hardly wait to see the look on her arrogant little face tomorrow morning.
Wh-Why have you returned so late at night?
Please, Diana's in trouble!
Let me in!
She did something to prevent Diana from doing the ritual.
It is past this door, is not it?
So let me through, please!
Please let me through!
I cannot.
It is our custom that only those of Cavendish lineage may pass through.
This is not the time for that stuff!
Something bad might be happening to Diana as we speak!
It is not the time for that stuff!
Something might be happening to Diana as we speak!
This is an emergency.
It will be too late if Diana really has been stopped!
That is got nothing on Sucy's!
It is nothing compared to Sucy's!
I see there are no limits to your absurdity.
Really, every time I feel as though I have grown accustomed to you...
Honestly, every time I feel as though I am used to you...
Besides, were not you attempting to prevent me from performing the ritual?
You hold no responsibility in the matter.
Because there were those who did not agree with us, we created this hidden location.
The 1500 year long history of the Cavendish line.
These books contain the culmination of my predecessors' research about countless forms of healing magic.
Many of them have unfortunately become obsolete with the development of the medical sciences.
The Cavendish foremother, Beatrix the witch.
She also created our founding motto of affection.
My mother Bernadette worked hard to ensure that stayed the same.
She had a weak constitution, and after years of pushing herself, she passed away.
She had a weak constitution, and passed away young after years of pushing herself.
Do not give up!
You can still protect this hosue!
You cannot say that until you go, until you try!
There must be a way!
You just cannot give up on a dream that is so important to you!
So you cannot give up on such an important dream!
If someone can do it, it is you!
You of all people can!
A saying that has been passed down throughout the generations.
It is a saying passed down throughout the generations.

Traditional and modern powers... and a gate to the unknown.
Is that the ritual shrine?
Is this the horrific calamity befalls those who disturb the ritual?
Does this mean... the time is now?
Could it be...
Is that the time?
Ennoir Fiendinoir!
At the very end, I decided to abandon it.
I would also like to suggest you return to Luna Nova.
And I also ask that you return to Luna Nova.
So please, follow the path that you yourself wish for.

Just wait, Diana!

Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
Only those of Cavendish blood are permitted to enter the shrine.
She said there was no time left.
Is there some reason she has to hurry?
Allow me to explain.
It manifests in the glow of the horn adorning the family's patron beast, the white unicorn.
When the Gem of Venus's radiance is obscured,
the seal on the shrine is undone, allowing she who swears upon her ancestors' souls to become the family head.
The Gem of Venus?
It likely refers to the planet.
That is right, today is the Venusian eclipse.
Venusian eclipse?
It is when Venus disappears for a short time due to passing behind the moon.
And that is tonight?
Yes.
This event occurs only once every several years.
She cannot let today's opportunity pass by.
Louperial Ral!
These snakes... they are my aunt's!
That took hardly any effort.
Without your magic, you are no more than a child.
Did I not say it was premature for you to become the family head?
Make yourself comfortable in there.
Up and leaving the moment his business is over?
My father is far too impatient.
Thinking about Diana?
Why do you want to take her back with you?
You did not appear to get along all that well.
It is not like we are friends or anything...
Diana is not the type of person to act on a whim or without reason.
This choice of hers must have come after thorough deliberation.
I think so too, but...
Plus, her stubbornness will not allow her to go back on her word.
Is not there only one reasonable option?
You have to respect her feelings.
That is not it!
Everything you said was right.
But I still cannot accept it!
Something is wrong with Diana just quitting school!
Is not that just your own selfish desires speaking?
Maybe it is...
But I can tell that Diana does not want to quit school.
Even if she will not talk to anyone about it...
How can you tell?
Did not you say it yourself?
Diana would never abandon something halfway through.
There is no way she came to Luna Nova without wanting to graduate.
So why would she just go and drop out?
That is...
Sure, Diana could do everything from the start, and maybe there was not anything left for her to learn.
But Diana would not have come to Luna Nova if she did not have a reason!
She was researching the Words and Grand Triskelion...
There must be at least one thing she wanted to accomplish!
Something important to her!
You said she could do everything from the start?
I am not surprised you would think that.
There was a time when Diana became completely unable to use magic.
Huh?
It was back when we were children.
I am not so sure of the details myself.
All the adults were talking about how Diana might never use magic again.
But now...
Right, she never gave up.
She forewent playing with the children her age.
All her time was wholeheartedly devoted to the practice of magic.
Not even I know what lit such a passion in her.
I never would have guessed...
You were right about one thing.
There must have been something she wanted to accomplish.
Though once she completes the ritual, she will be the Cavendish family head.
It is a road she alone can take, and she is elected to do so.
That does not mean...
Wait, Meryl!
Come back!
Are you sure about this?
Mama told us to wait in our room.
But she is going up against Diana, Maryl.
Damn!
I am worried about her being alone.
Well, so am I...
I hate that girl.
She is not the slightest bit lovable.
If someone had to do it, I would have.
There is no way you could beat Diana, Meryl.
I know that!
Mama!
Goodness, did not I tell you two to wait in your room?
I could not stand being cooped up in there!
So, how did it go?
It took me hardly any effort, of course.
Wow, Mama!
But Mama, do not forget what Diana's like.
Yeah, she should still be able to break through lesser magic.
Do not you worry.
Nobody can escape the grip of my snakes.
Forget about performing the ritualDiana will run out of time before she even reaches the shrine.
I am already anxious to see the look on her arrogant little face come tomorrow morning.
Wh-Why did you return this late at night?
Please, Diana's in trouble!
You need to let me in!
What?
What ridiculous
It is the truth.
L-Lord Andrew?
We overheard Daryl speaking with her daughters.
She did something to prevent Diana from performing the ritual.
Madam Daryl did?
She said Diana would not even be able to reach the shrine.
It is just past this door, is not it?
You have to let me through!
I cannot.
It is our custom that only members of the House of Cavendish may pass.
This is not the time for that stuff!
Something bad might be happening to Diana as we speak!
This is an emergency.
If they really stopped Diana, it will soon be too late!
H-However, it is said that a horrific calamity will befall those who disturb the ritual!
Open...!
I will help!
You wait here, Andrew.
But
I am a witch too, you know.
I am strong against calamities.
I promise to bring Diana back.
Got it.
I have changed my mind!
The customs
Customs are made to be broken!
Metamorphie Faciesse!
Over there...
Diana!
Metamorphie Faciesse!
How is that?!
Diana!
Are you okay?!
Ow ow ow!
You call that poison?
It is got nothing on Sucy's!
Metamorphie Faciesse!
Akko!
Akko...
Akko!
Have you awakened?
Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
Diana...
I see there are simply no limits to your absurdity.
I was trying to save you...
I understand.
Honestly, every time I feel as though I have grown accustomed to you...
You continue to astonish me in unexpected ways.
Diana, what about the ritual?!
Even if I left for the shrine now, the Venusian eclipse would be long over.
What?
No, it cannot be...
Why did not you leave me behind?
Is not this the whole reason you are here?
So why?!
I could not possibly leave you to deal with your injuries.
Besides, were not you attempting to persuade me to not perform the ritual?
I mean, I was...
Sorry, this is all my fault.
You hold no responsibility in this matter.
I was simply not adequate.
Um, Diana, where are we?
This room was once used as a secret hospital.
It began in the Middle Ages and lasted through the previous war.
Whenever wars occurred in the vicinity, my ancestors would treat the wounded with their magic.
Without discriminating between citizen and soldier, nor discriminating between ally or foe.
Even their enemies?
No matter who they were.
Because there were some who did not agree with us, we created this hidden location.
It is all so much...
What is this?
All 1,500 years of the history of the Cavendish line.
These books represent the culmination of my predecessors' research
about countless forms of healing magic.
Unfortunately, many of them have become obsolete with the advance of the medical sciences.
Is not she...
One of the Nine Olde Witches?
The Cavendish foremother, Beatrix the Witch.
Her magic saved the lives of innumerable people.
She also created our founding motto, Affection.
We live in a time of peace, and this place has not been used in years.
My mother Bernadette worked hard to ensure it would remain this way.
Your mother?
She had a weak constitution, and after years of pushing herself, she passed away all too soon.
I am truly proud of what my mother and ancestors did, and of the Cavendish name.
That is why...
I wanted to protect it, to preserve this home...
Do not give up!
You can still protect this house!
It is already over!
There is no chance of making it now
You cannot say that until you gountil you try!
There must be a way!
I had no idea you had such a heartfelt dream.
It is amazing!
That is a wonderful dream!
You cannot just give up on a dream that is so important to you!
Protect what is precious to you!
Akko...
And then come back to school too!
Huh?
You can do bothbe the head and attend school!
That is the best option!
No, it would be impossible to
You can do it!
If anyone can do it, it is you!
Believe in yourself and your heart!
Believe in... my heart...
The staff... is a Word nearby?
When traditional and modern powers mingle, the gate to an unseen world will open.
It is a saying that has been passed down throughout the generations.
Is that the fifth Word, the one related to history?
Akko, recite it!
Sybilladura Lelladybura.
Sybilladura.
Sybilladura...
Lelladybura!
Lelladybura!
Oh yeah!
It is Chariot's broom, the Shiny Volley!
Take it, Diana!
Traditional and modern powers... and a gate to the unknown.
Akko, let us go together!
Okay!
Tia Freyre!
Yes!
Diana, that means we made it!
We will not let you go...
Any further than this!
Aeguil!
Is this the ritual shrine?
I said we would not let you go!
Is this the horrific calamity that befalls those who disturb the ritual?
Diana...
Save us!
Save us...
Diana!
Could that be... the remaining time?
We have to hurry!
Diana!
Diana?
Hey, Diana!
Ennor Fiendennor!
Lady Beatrix?
Diana...
Young Lady.
I was unable to complete the ritual.
At the very end, I made the determination to abandon it.
I do not regret my decision.
Young Lady, please stop pretending as though you have forgotten.
There is no need to be reserved.
Please pursue the dream you have had ever since your childhood.
I must also suggest you return to Luna Nova.
What?
Pardon my rudeness, but you no longer have any reason to stay here.
But
Until you can once again return to the manor, we will protect it in your stead.
So please, follow the path you yourself wish to walk.
Everyone... thank you.
Madam Daryl!
She is too obsessed with her Cavendish pride.
What a thoroughly charmless child.
She really is my sister's daughter, in that regard.
But... that may just allow her to revive the Cavendish family one day.
Yes, I am certain.
Kagari Atsuko, how could you possibly forget this?
I am so glad I got you to give me a lift home.
Akko.
What is up?
There is one thing that I cannot leave unsaid.
Huh?
What now, did I mess up again somehow?!
I must say...
I am grateful for what you did.
No way!
What was that?
What did you just say?!
I will not repeat myself.
No, I really could not hear!
Say it again!
I will not.
Just one more time!
I will absolutely not say it!
Do not be so bashful!
I will drop you!
